item.title: The Same-Origin Policy Gone Wild
item.description: I will talk about some edge cases of the Same-Origin Policy (SOP). It affects browser based thickclient platforms so it's not just for web application security. This is a more detailed dive into this topic that I touched briefly in the localghost talk.
